description.tooltip: Assemblies present in database, with modules
description.label: Assemblies

queries.query: SELECT am.assembly_class, am.assembly_method, OBJECT_NAME(am.object_id) as object_name, a.clr_name, a.name as assembly_name, a.create_date, a.modify_date, a.is_user_defined FROM sys.assembly_modules am JOIN sys.assemblies a ON am.assembly_id = a.assembly_id;
